Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Sokoto Diocese
Fr Joe Keke dị afọ 75 atọọrọ n'abalị Tọzde mana enwebeghị onye hụrụ ya ruo ugbua
Ndị ekperima wakporo ụlọụka St. Vincent Catholic Church na Katsina steeti n'isi ụtụtụ Fraịde, gbuo otu ụkọchukwu, ma tọrọ ụkọchukwu ọzọ.
Ọnụ na-ekwuru ụka Katọlik na dayosis Sokoto bụ Christopher Omotosho kwuru nke a n'akwụkwọ ozi o zipụrụ na Fraịde.
Ebe foto si, Catholic Diocese of Sokoto/Facebook
Onyeisi ndị uweojii enyela iwu ka achọta ndị gburu ụkọchukwu
Aka ndị uweojii a kparala onye so gbuo otu ụkọchukwu
'Jogging' ka ndị ụkọchukwu mere n'Enugu - Mbaka
Akụkọ kachasị: Aka akparala ndị gburu Ụkọchukwu
Omotosho kwuru na ndị ekperima ahụ kpụụrụ ndị ụkọchukwu abụọ oge ha wakporo ya bụ ụlọụka, mana e mechara hụ ozu otu n'ime ndị ụkọchukwu ahụ.
Anya ahụbeghi ụkọchukwu nke ọzọ ruo ugbua, dịka Omotosho si kwuo.
Aha ụkọchukwu abụọ a bụ: Joe Keke, onye gbara afọ iri asaa na ise; na Alphonsus Bello, dị afọ iri atọ na atọ.
Ebe foto si, Sokoto Diocese
Ndị ekperima wakporo ụlọụka St Vincent Catholic Church na Katsina steeti n'isi ụtụtụ Fraịde, gbuo Fr. Alphonsos Bello dị afọ 33
Ọ bụ Alphonsus Bello ka a hụrụ ozu ya, ebe Joe Keke bụ onye a kpụụrụ pụọ.
"Anyị amaghị ebe a kpụ ya gawa, ndị ekperima ahụ akpọbeghị anyị n'ekwentị," Omotosho kwuru.
